settings_modal.title: Settings
settings_modal.refresh_interval_description: Set the interval for checking server process status
settings_modal.advanced_placeholder: Advanced settings will be added here.
settings_modal.ipc_port_description: Port number for core daemon to listen on (1024‚Äì65535)
settings_modal.ipc_port_restart_notice: Port change will take effect after daemon restart
settings_modal.console_buffer_description: Maximum number of lines to keep in server console
settings_modal.no_extensions: No extensions found. Place extension folders in the extensions/ directory.
settings_modal.extensions_moved_hint: Extension management has moved to Saba Storage.
settings_modal.extensions_toggle_hint: Enable or disable installed extensions. Install, remove, and update via Saba Storage.
settings_modal.relay_url_description: URL of the relay server for cloud mode. Uses default server if empty.
settings_modal.auto_generate_passwords_description: Automatically fill empty RCON/REST password fields with random passwords when opening server settings.
settings_modal.port_conflict_check_description: Show warnings when multiple server instances use the same port.

add_server_modal.title: Add New Server
add_server_modal.subtitle: Select a game module and configure your new server instance.
add_server_modal.select_game_subtitle: Choose a game to set up your new server.
add_server_modal.configure_subtitle: Name your server instance and set options.
add_server_modal.place_modules_hint: Place .zip files or folders with module.toml here
add_server_modal.provision_hint: The module will be embedded in the instance and server binaries will be downloaded automatically.
add_server_modal.docker_isolation_hint_on: The server will run in a Docker container. Docker Engine is required.
add_server_modal.docker_isolation_hint_off: The server will run natively on the host. Docker is not required.
add_server_modal.no_modules: No modules found. Check Advanced Settings for the modules directory.
add_server_modal.native_limit_warning: A native instance '{{existing}}' already exists for this module. Enable container isolation to create another instance.
add_server_modal.migrate_existing_hint: Import an existing game server directory into saba-chan.

add_instance_modal.title: Add Instance
add_instance_modal.subtitle: Choose how to add a new server instance.
add_instance_modal.new_server_desc: Select a game module and create a fresh server instance from scratch.
add_instance_modal.migrate_desc: Import an existing game server directory into a saba-chan instance.
add_instance_modal.migration_coming_soon: Migration wizard steps will be implemented here.

migration_modal.title: Server Migration
migration_modal.description: Import an existing game server into a saba-chan instance
migration_modal.no_auto_detect: Could not automatically detect the game server. Please select a module below.
migration_modal.no_modules_available: No modules available in the registry.
migration_modal.configure_subtitle: Name the new instance for the migrated server.
migration_modal.migrate_hint: The selected directory will be linked to the new instance. Server files remain in their original location.
migration_modal.move_files_hint: When enabled, original files will be moved. When disabled, they will be copied.

command_modal.title: Execute Command - {{name}}
command_modal.server_not_running_message:
Server '{{name}}' must be running to execute commands.

Current status: {{status}}

server_actions.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete server '{{name}}'?
server_actions.clone_confirm: Clone instance '{{name}}'? The port will be shifted by +{{offset}} to avoid conflicts.
server_actions.steamcmd_install_confirm: Install server for '{{name}}' via SteamCMD? (App ID: {{appId}})
server_actions.steamcmd_not_available: SteamCMD is not available. Please install it or configure its path.
server_actions.docker_required: Docker is required for this server. Please install Docker Desktop.
server_actions.docker_installing: Installing Docker automatically. This may take a few minutes‚Ä¶
server_actions.docker_install_restart: Docker installed, but a system restart or manual Docker Desktop launch may be needed.
server_actions.migrate_confirm: Migrate server at '{{path}}' into saba-chan? Files will be {{action}}.

server_settings.title: Settings
server_settings.protocol_description: Select the protocol to use when executing server commands.
server_settings.protocol_rest_hint: REST API is HTTP-based, stable, and easy to authenticate.
server_settings.protocol_rcon_hint: RCON sends real-time console commands directly.
server_settings.protocol_single_only: This module only supports the {{protocol}} protocol.
server_settings.no_settings: This module has no additional settings.
server_settings.module_aliases_title: Module Aliases (Names to call this server on Discord)
server_settings.module_aliases_hint: Separate multiple entries with spaces. e.g., {{module}} pw palworld
server_settings.command_aliases_hint: Separate multiple aliases with commas. e.g., start, begin, run
server_settings.version_description_install: Select a version and click Install to download the server JAR.
server_settings.install_version_confirm:
Install Minecraft {{version}} for server '{{name}}'?

This will download and replace the server JAR file.
server_settings.reset_server_desc: Delete all worlds, settings, logs, and other data. Only the server JAR and eula.txt will be kept. This cannot be undone.
server_settings.reset_settings_desc: Reset all server settings to factory defaults. World and save data will be preserved. This cannot be undone.
server_settings.reset_confirm:
Completely reset server '{{name}}'?

This will delete all worlds, settings, logs, and other data.
Only the server JAR and eula.txt will be kept.

This action cannot be undone.
server_settings.reset_success: Server '{{name}}' has been reset ({{count}} items deleted)
server_settings.docker_resources_desc: Configure CPU and memory limits for this Docker container. Changes will regenerate docker-compose.yml.
server_settings.docker_cpu_limit_desc: Number of CPU cores to allocate. Leave empty for no limit.
server_settings.docker_memory_limit_desc: Memory limit with unit (e.g., 512m, 2g, 4g). Leave empty for no limit.
server_settings.docker_restart_hint: Resource limit changes take effect after restarting the server.

app_exit.confirm_message: How would you like to exit?
app_exit.confirm_detail:
Hide GUI: Continue running in background (can be reopened from tray)
Quit All: Stop daemon and exit completely

servers.stop_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to stop {{name}} server?
servers.jar_not_found_message:
Server executable (server.jar) is not configured.
You can specify a path or install a new server.
servers.extension_required_message: Server '{{name}}' requires an extension that is not currently enabled.

settings.aliases_reset_message: Aliases have been reset to default
settings.alias_conflict_detail: Alias '{{alias}}' is already registered to module '{{module}}'
settings.multiple_instances_warning: Multiple instances use the same module '{{module}}' ({{names}}). Discord bot commands using module aliases will be ambiguous ‚Äî use instance names instead.
settings.alias_ambiguity_card: Module '{{module}}' has {{count}} instances ‚Äî Discord alias is ambiguous

buttons.loading_tips: You can manage multiple game servers simultaneously

errors.executable_not_found: Game server executable not found. Please check the path in settings.
errors.file_not_found: File or folder not found. Please check the path.
errors.permission_denied: Permission denied. Please check file access permissions.
errors.daemon_connection_refused: Cannot connect to daemon. Please check if daemon is running.
errors.request_timeout: Request timed out. Please check network status.
errors.server_not_found: Server not found. Please check the address.
errors.network_error: Network error occurred. Please check connection status.
errors.module_failed_to_start: Failed to start server. Please check settings.
errors.failed_to_stop: Failed to stop server. You may need to force kill the process.
errors.process_not_found: Process not found. Server may have crashed.
errors.invalid_configuration: Configuration is invalid. Please check settings.
errors.missing_required_field: Required field is missing. Please check settings.
errors.module_not_found: Module not found. Please check if module is installed correctly.
errors.failed_to_load_module: Failed to load module. Please check module files.
errors.invalid_token: Invalid Discord token. Please check your token.
errors.cloud_token_not_found: Node token not found. Please re-pair in Cloud settings.
errors.port_conflict_detail: Port {{port}} is already used by instance '{{name}}'

background_modal.title: Background Services
background_modal.about_description: Core Daemon is a background service responsible for managing game server processes, IPC communication, and module loading.
background_modal.about_note: The daemon continues to run even when the GUI is closed and can be managed from the system tray.

discord_modal.title: Discord Bot
discord_modal.prefix_description: Command prefix that the bot will respond to (Required)
discord_modal.usage_instruction: Use the following format to execute commands in Discord:
discord_modal.usage_note: Module-specific aliases and command aliases can be configured in each server's Settings ‚Üí Discord Aliases tab.
discord_modal.music_toggle_description: Enable YouTube music playback via Discord voice channels
discord_modal.music_module_aliases_desc: Set aliases to access the music module. (comma-separated)
discord_modal.music_command_aliases_desc: Set custom aliases for each music command. (comma-separated)
discord_modal.music_aliases_reset_done: Music command aliases have been reset.
discord_modal.music_cmd_play_desc: Play music from YouTube URL or search query
discord_modal.music_cmd_stop_desc: Stop playback and leave voice channel
discord_modal.mode_cloud_desc: Connect to remote daemon via relay server
discord_modal.relay_url_description: Address of the Saba-chan relay server
discord_modal.host_id_description: ID issued via the /saba-chan register command
discord_modal.cloud_incomplete_warning: Both Relay URL and Host ID are required for cloud mode to work.
discord_modal.music_cloud_notice: Music feature requires Voice connection and is not available in cloud mode.
discord_modal.pair_description: Pair your device through the relay server to connect in cloud mode.
discord_modal.pair_instruction: Enter the following command in Discord:
discord_modal.pair_success: Pairing complete! Settings have been applied automatically.
discord_modal.pair_expired: Pairing code has expired. Please generate a new one.
discord_modal.pair_relay_url_required: Please enter the relay server URL first.
discord_modal.cloud_setup_desc: Connect your Discord bot to this PC via the relay server. Choose one of the methods below.
discord_modal.cloud_method_discord_desc: Run the following slash command in your Discord server:
discord_modal.cloud_method_pair_desc: Generate a code from this GUI and enter it in Discord.
discord_modal.cloud_no_nodes_hint: Add a server using the /saba-chan link command in Discord.
discord_modal.allowed_instances_desc: Select server instances that the Discord bot can control.
discord_modal.no_instances_available: No server instances available. Please add a server first.
discord_modal.members_desc: Members from your Discord server. Check to allow bot command access.
discord_modal.members_bot_not_running: Start the bot to automatically load Discord server members.
discord_modal.no_instances_for_perms: Select instances in the Instances tab first.
discord_modal.no_commands_available: No commands available for this module.
discord_modal.no_commands_hint: Unchecked commands will not be available to this member.
discord_modal.cloud_setup_desc_simple: Generate a pairing code and enter it in Discord to connect automatically.

updates.completed_success: All updates have been applied successfully.
updates.no_updates: All components are up to date.

extensions.store_empty: Click refresh to load available extensions.
extensions.error_not_found: Extension '{{id}}' not found. It may have been removed.
extensions.error_dep_missing: Cannot enable '{{id}}': required extension '{{dep}}' is not installed. Install it first.
extensions.error_dep_disabled: Cannot enable '{{id}}': required extension '{{dep}}' is not enabled. Enable it first.
extensions.error_has_dependents: Cannot disable '{{id}}': other extensions depend on it ({{deps}}). Disable them first.
extensions.error_in_use: Cannot disable '{{id}}': in use by server instance(s): {{instances}}. Remove usage first.
extensions.error_network: Failed to {{action}} extension '{{id}}'. Check daemon connection.

saba_storage.title: Saba Storage
saba_storage.remove_confirm_msg: Remove module '{{id}}'? This cannot be undone and any server instances using this module will no longer be able to run.
saba_storage.remove_confirm_msg_ext: Remove extension '{{id}}'? The files will be permanently deleted.
